name: Yeti Ruption
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Vision Statement

Play as a yeti in a dynamic puzzle game with air-hockey mechanics in an ice world!

USP’s

• Fullbody air-hockey, where the player is the mallet and the stones are the pucks.

• Player can take control of a very unique character, Funky Frankie.

• The game has a high level variability in terms of different settings and approaches without the core mechanics being changed.

Facts

• Genre: Action-Puzzle

• Perspective: Top-Down

• Art-Style: Comic-Style with box models (low poly)

• Setting: Ice world

• Platform: PC + Gamepad

• Engine: Unity 5

• Target Audience: 12+ years

Core Features

• Mechanics: Dynamic interactions with objects and environment provide a fast-paced gameplay.

• Levels: Six levels with unique settings, which each require different approaches to accomplish.

• Fail Conditions: A timer and a low total health count pressurize the player and demand a risk/

reward gameplay.
